VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Geriatric Care Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Geriatric Care Hospital is arc {Commdata_unity Health Center}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Geriatric Care Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Geriatric Care Hospital is arc {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Geriatric Care Hospital} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Commdata_unity Health Center} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 248? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {341} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Geriatric Care Hospital}, a flow of {428} from {Geriatric Care Hospital} to {Commdata_unity Health Center}, a flow of {328} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Geriatric Care Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 248? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {61} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}, a flow of {169} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Commdata_unity Health Center}, a flow of {166} from {Geriatric Care Hospital} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 167 and 334? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {169} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Commdata_unity Health Center}, a flow of {328} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Geriatric Care Hospital}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Commdata_unity Health Center to Maternal and Child Health Center or from Maternal and Child Health Center to Commdata_unity Health Center?
NC.A: The flow from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Commdata_unity Health Center} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Maternal and Child Health Center to Commdata_unity Health Center, from Commdata_unity Health Center to Geriatric Care Hospital, or from Maternal and Child Health Center to Geriatric Care Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Geriatric Care Hospital} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Commdata_unity Health Center} and {Geriatric Care Hospital}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Maternal and Child Health Center, Arc Geriatric Care Hospital, Arc Commdata_unity Health Center}.
